ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَن نَّدْخُلَهَآ أَبَدًا مَّا دَامُوا۟ فِيهَا فَٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَرَبُّكَ فَقَٰتِلَآ إِنَّا هَٰهُنَا قَٰعِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We will never enter it, Musa, as long as they are there. So you and your Lord go and fight. We will stay sitting here.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "O Moses, we shall never, never enter so long as they are there. Go you and your Lord to fight them; we stay here."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nevertheless they said: 'O Moses! Never shall we enter it as long as they are there. Go forth, then, you and your Lord, and fight, both of you. As for us, we will sit here.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "(Moses), as long as they are in the land, we shall never go there. Go with your Lord to fight them but we shall stay where we are".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “O Moosa! We will never enter it whilst they are there, so you and your Lord go and fight – we shall remain seated here.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "O Musa! We shall never enter it as long as they are there. So go, you and your Lord, and fight you two, we are sitting right here."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: O Musa! we shall never enter it so long as they are in it; go therefore you and your Lord, then fight you both surely we will here sit down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Moses, we will never enter it so long as they are in it. Go forth, thou and thy Lord, and do battle; we will be sitting here.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: O Moses! We will never enter (the land) while they are in it. So go thou and thy Lord and fight! We will sit here.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "We will never enter it, Moses, as long as they are there. Go, you and your Lord, and fight, and we will stay here."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: O Musa! verily we shall never enter it so long as they remain therein; go thou and thy Lord, and fight ye twain, we shall remain here sitting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘O Moses, we will never enter it so long as they remain in it. Go ahead, you and your Lord, and fight! We will be sitting right here.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "O Moses! while they remain there, never shall we be able to enter, to the end of time. Go thou, and thy Lord, and fight ye two, while we sit here (and watch)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "O Musa (Moses)! We shall never enter it as long as they are there. So go you and your Lord and fight you two, we are sitting right here."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'Moses, we will never go in so long as they are in it. Go, you and your Lord, to fight. We will stay here'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “O Moses, we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are in it. So go ahead, you and your Lord, and fight. We are staying right here.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "O Moses, indeed we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are within it; so go, you and your Lord, and fight. Indeed, we are remaining right here."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:24] They said, ‘O Moses, we will never enter it so long as they are in it. So go forth, you and your Lord, and fight, them, we will be sitting here’, away from the fighting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Moses! We will never enter (the land)) of the giant people (while they are in it. So go thou and thy Lord) go with your master Aaron (and fight) for your Lord will help you as He did against Pharaoh and his people! (We will sit here) and wait.
